author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/fatal-fury-city-of-the-wolves/

Chun-Li from Street Fighter stakes out
FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves this winter!
 
■ Fatal Fury x Street Fighter: The dream crossover!
Chun-Li from renowned fighting game franchise Street Fighter (Capcom) joins fellow Metro City mainstay Ken in FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves! Their inclusion amounts to a legendary crossover like no other, as Fatal Fury's own Terry Bogard and Mai Shiranui are already on the Street Fighter 6 roster. Ken and Chun-Li join City of the Wolves as part of Season Pass 1, with Ken already arriving in Summer 2025 and Chun-Li set for Winter 2025.
 
■ Chun-Li (Voice Actors: Jennie Kwan)
A battle-hardened Metro City agent who arrives in South Town, by request, to investigate the resurgence of an infamous criminal syndicate. Few wolves here can match the strength, style, and grace of this World Warrior—let alone best her outright. Perhaps the only one who can hold a candle to her is the fiery kunoic
title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves - Street Fighter: Chun-Li | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/fortnite/

Sidekicks are a new cosmetic in Fortnite that tag along in Battle Royale, LEGO® Fortnite, creator-made experiences, and more. Enjoy their company as they react to the world around you! You can customize the Appearance of most Sidekicks one time in your Locker after obtaining ‘em. Your choices are permanent, so make sure to preview the Appearance before locking it in.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #fortnite
title: Fortnite - Sidekicks Tutorial Video | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/battlefield-redsec/

It’s music to your ears. Battlefield REDSEC is free to play and available now. Grab the squad and drop in today.

Drop into Fort Lyndon with massive destruction and the deadliest Battle Royale ring. Squad up for Gauntlet to hack and flip objectives, then dive into Portal.

Play free now. 

You know the tune. Drop in 🪂

Play #REDSEC free now.
title: Battlefield REDSEC - Official Live-Action Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Feel the rush in Apex Legends™: Amped! Get ready to fly higher, move without limits, and amp up the firepower. 

Chase new heights in the updated Olympus: rebuilt for better flow, dynamic positioning, and elevated gameplay. Dive into turbocharged Legend updates and the new Mantle Boost mechanic, fire up the Alternator with double-barreled devastation, and more. 

Lock in and feel the rush, Legends.

Apex Legends™ is a free-to-play* battle royale game where legendary characters battle for glory, fame, and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier. Play for free now on PlayStation® 4, PlayStation 5.

Credits:
Production Company: Electronic Arts & Dark Burn Creative
Sound Design and Mix: Respawn Entertainment & Mass Audio
All other categories: Electronic Arts & Respawn Entertainment

*Applicable platform account and platform subscription (sold separately) may be required. Persistent internet connection and EA account required. Age restrictions apply. This game includes optional in-game purc
title: Apex Legends - Amped Gameplay Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10016502

I Hate This Place: The Game is an eerie isometric survival horror simply drenched and oozing in its distinct comic book style and vibe.

Coming to PS5 on January 29th, 2025.

Inspired by the Eisner award-nominated comic book series created by Kyle Starks and Artyom Topilin, I Hate This Place: The Game plunges players deep into a supernatural world where the rules of reality come undone. In an all-new isometric survival horror experience, delivered in a striking visual style drenched in bold, vivid colours and retro ‘80s comic book aesthetics.

Players take on the role of Elena, whose fight for survival begins when she unwittingly awakens a malevolent force. Outmatched and hunted in a hostile world, players must think fast, manipulating their surroundings to even the odds against formidable foes, engaging in tense gunfights and melee combat that rewards ingenuity over brute force, all while crafting essential tools to survive the harsh an
title: I Hate This Place - Story and New Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
The deeper we venture, the harsher the truths we uncover.
Yet there is no turning back.
The gears of industry in Endfield have begun to turn once more—and a new journey awaits, ready for you to pen its prologue.
Endministrator, guide us... toward the unlit world.

—

Arknights: Endfield is a real-time 3D RPG with strategic elements published by GRYPHLINE.

description:

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/monster-hunter-stories-3-twisted-reflection/

Azuira and Vermeil, two countries on a path to destruction through the flames of war. As hope is extinguished and the shadow of despair looms, take on the role of a Rider, and along with your trusted Rathalos, friends and monstie allies, set out on a fateful journey for the truth. 

Discover an adventure like no other in Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection, combining our unique take on turn-based RPGs and monster taming, with the world of Monster Hunter! 

Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection launches on PlayStation 5 on March 13, 2026!

©CAPCOM CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

#ps5 #ps5games #monsterhunter
title: Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection - Introduction Video | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Pre-order Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection now.:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/monster-hunter-stories-3-twisted-reflection/
 
Embark on an expansive RPG adventure, and a true evolution of the Monster Hunter Stories series, filled with memorable twists and turns. Palamutes, new allies, an encounter with the living mountain, Yama Tsukami, and much more await you beyond the Meridian.
 
Your story begins March 13, 2026 for PlayStation 5.

#ps5 #ps5games #monsterhunter
title: Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection - Pre-order Trailer | PS5 Games
